name: di1
author: Bogdan Savluk <savluk.bogdan@gmail.com>
description: Simple but yet functional, DI container for JavaScript

scripts.cover: rimraf coverage && istanbul cover -x "*.test.js" ./node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js && npm run cover_remapping
scripts.cover_remapping: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.lcov -t lcovonly && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped -t html
scripts.build: rimraf lib && babel --optional runtime src --out-dir lib --source-maps
